items.title: Electronics course for Arduino and pi Students (+Projects)
items.headline: A solid foundation for Arduino and Raspberry pi programming students
objectives_summary: This course teaches you all you need to know in basic electronics from resistor to IC.
You'll understand what voltage, current, and resistance are. And the relationship between them
You'll understand what a voltage divider network is and how to use it with different sensors

items.title: Electronics Fundamentals 2021- Understand Electronic Circuit
items.headline: The Complete Course that will get you started in the Learning of Electronics and how to build simple Electronic Circuit
objectives_summary: This course will completely get you started in the study of ELECTRONICS as well as how to build simple electronic circuit using some common semiconductor components
Understand basic concept of Electricity and Electronics
By the end of this course you should be able to analyze and design simple electronics circuits using some common semiconductor components such as diodes, transistors, operational amplifiers etc

items.title: Getting Started with Azure IoT Central
items.headline: Learn about Azure IoT Central from scratch and get started in your IoT journey.
objectives_summary: Understand the core concepts of Azure IoT Central, beyond the ones you normally use
Build cutting edge Azure IoT Central Apps within minutes
Interfacing Real IoT Devices with Azure IoT Central

items.title: Arduino Obstacle Avoiding Robot: Step by Step
items.headline: Your step-by-step guide to building an Arduino obstacle avoiding robot using IR and ultrasonic sensors
objectives_summary: Build a functioning Arduino based obstacle avoidance robot that detects obstacles via an ultrasonic or IR sensor

items.title: Internet Of Things (IoT) - Demystified using 3 IOT devices

items.headline: Become IOT expert with Arduino, NODE MCU ESP 8266/ESP 32 & Raspberry Pi - using sensors, micro-python and cloud platform
objectives_summary: Quickly learn about Arduino Uno, NODE MCU 8266 and Raspberry PI along with critical protocols and its communication to cloud
Understand how micropython firmware are deployed or embedded on to IOT devices like NODEMCU ESP 8266 / ESP 32
Understand commonly used IOT protocols such as REST API, MQTT through IOT based demonstration.

items.title: Ship It!  Hardware Product Development for Beginners
items.headline: From just an idea to out the door
objectives_summary: You will become empowered to turn an idea in your head into a real product
You will gain the courage to say "No" to previously-beloved not-so-good ideas and therefore make room in your life for better ones
You will quickly learn what you need to get started, enabling you to beat others with a similar idea to market

Learn how to design and code amazing and beautiful web dashboard apps
Learn how to use ChartJS to graph real-world sensor data

items.title: Speech recognition based home automation
